function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of concerted and coordinated global effort","Impact":"Substantial economic, social, and humanitarian impacts","Mitigation":"International cooperation and collaboration, global health policies and strategies","Technologies":"Global health surveillance systems, communication technologies for information exchange","People":"Vulnerable households, global population","Owner":"International organizations, governments, global health bodies"},{"Description":"Lockdown in China affecting Australian economy","Impact":"Sudden fall in imports, shutdown of production, job losses","Mitigation":"Diversification of trading partners, domestic production of critical products, job retraining programs","Technologies":"Trade data analytics, manufacturing technologies, online education platforms","People":"Workers, businesses reliant on Chinese imports","Owner":"Government, businesses, trade organizations"},{"Description":"Widespread loss of jobs, hours, and income","Impact":"Increased poverty, economic instability, social unrest","Mitigation":"Unemployment support programs, retraining and upskilling initiatives, economic stimulus packages","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, online learning platforms, economic forecasting and analysis tools","People":"Workers, vulnerable households","Owner":"Government, employers, educational institutions"}]}
